2.1.3
  • Fixed Article view appearing transparent for Amoled black theme
  • Search suggestions improvements - reduce flicker, highlight matching query, long tap to edit suggestion
  • Crash fixes
2.1.2
  • FIX: Clear text communication error.
2.1.1
  • FIX: Open/Search with Lynket option not using selected search engine
  • FIX: Aggressive background loading - sometimes tab not minimizing automatically.
  • IMPROVED: Use Vibrant palette for placeholder icons
  • IMPROVED: Preview tab icons in home screen
2.1

General

  • NEW: Android 10 - Bubbles support! New browsing mode that use Android\'s native bubbles for web multitasking. Requires extra steps to be enabled, please follow this guide.
  • NEW: Ability to change default search engine.
  • NEW: Tabs launcher shortcut (Android 7.1+)
  • IMPROVED: Webview provider load performance after getting killed in background
  • IMPROVED: If clipboard contains multiple links, extract them and show as individual suggestion items in search bar
  • FIX: Menu -> Copy Link does not work/slow sometimes
  • FIX: Webview provider bottom bar not respecting toolbar color setting
  • NEW: Suggest Kiwi and Vivaldi providers
  • NEW: Option to have new line separated list when sharing multiple links
  • IMPROVED: Android 10 support

Design

  • NEW: Light weight and simpler app home screen
  • IMPROVED: Show search suggestion for history items as grid with favicons
  • IMPROVED: New Tab search bar aligned to screen bottom

Performance

  • IMPROVED: Improved custom tabs and app launch performance (reduce jank)
  • IMPROVED: Tabs switching performance
2.0.2
  • NEW: Custom Minimize Behaviors - Minimize to web heads even if web heads are disabled.
  • NEW: New Tab and Tabs shortcuts in Menu > Lynket options
  • FIXES: AMP links not loading sometimes.
  • FIXES: Website favicons not loading when cache is cleared.
  • IMPROVED: Sync translations.
  • IMPROVED: Android Pie Support
  • IMPROVED: Open keyboard automatically on clicking new tab.
2.0.1 - 2nd Anniversary Update!

Design

  • NEW: Round and Adaptive Icon for Android Oreo
  • NEW: New home screen with bottom search bar inspired by Google apps
  • NEW: Lynket uses website favicons to calculate toolbar color.
  • NEW: Bottom bar now shows text in addition to icons
  • NEW: Light nav bar for 8.1
  • NEW: Tips screen

Features

  • NEW: TABS! See all active tabs opened by Lynket in one screen and quickly switch to them
  • NEW: Per App Settings! Configure secondary browser and incognito modes based on app.
  • NEW: Incognito mode! By using system webview as provider.
  • NEW: History app shortcuts for 7.1
  • NEW: Use custom names while creating home screen shortcuts + Oreo support
  • NEW: Minimize does not require web heads to be enabled.
  • NEW: Search bar shows suggestions from Clipboard and History
  • NEW: Info card in home screen to show active provider
  • NEW: New tab dialog shows search suggestions
  • NEW: Better tab provider picker. Lynket now recommends supported browsers

Performance

  • IMPROVED: Multitasking performance has been greatly improved.
  • IMPROVED: Does not load duplicate tabs
  • IMPROVED: Aggressive background loading is smoother
  • IMPROVED: 40% smaller APK size

Article mode

  • NEW: AMOLED Black theme
  • NEW: Change text size
  • NEW: Bottom bar with additional options
  • NEW: System bars dim automatically in article mode.
  • FIX: Crash when tapping on certain links

AMP Mode

  • NEW: AMP resolver dialog with option to skip.

Others

  • FIX: Lynket not opening links sometimes.
  • FIX: Certain languages not rendering correctly in search bar
  • FIX: History deletion bug
  • FIX: Consistency in dynamic toolbar color
  • IMPROVED: Stability of web heads has been improved. Minor UI fixes. Change More menu name to "Lynket Options" for better clarity
  • IMPROVED: Sync translations
1.7.2
  • NEW: Home screen UI with bottom bar.
  • NEW: Circle icon for 7.1+ and supported launchers
  • NEW: Overhauled history screen. Option to disable history.
  • NEW: Article mode shortcut in bottom bar.
  • NEW: AMP indicator in history to show if there is an AMP version available, tapping this would launch the AMP version.
  • FIXES: Old website reuse bug, crash fixes, duplicate history entries.
1.7

New browsing modes!

  • Article view! A reader mode which filters all images and ads on a page and displays only the content of the page - Full support with web heads.
  • AMP Support! Lynket can now launch the AMP version of the page if it exists for faster loading and better reading experience on mobile.
  • To enable, Settings > Browsing mode > AMP , Article mode.

Design

  • NEW: Major UI over haul and moved settings to its own page with better categorization.
  • NEW: Simpler home screen with recently launched links shortcuts.

History

  • NEW: In addition to syncing history with Google account, Lynket now provides its own history option.

Others

  • NEW: Lynket opens the page in web view in case custom tab provider is not found.
  • NEW: Menu option under "More" to easily open the current page in article mode.
  • NEW: Web head service notification now has actions for creating new tab and managing web heads
  • IMPROVED: Web head animations and performance.
  • IMPROVED: Aggressive background loading performance.
  • IMPROVED: Performance improvements in many areas, related to storage.
  • MISC: Removed screen scanning option.
1.6.3
  • NEW:Pressing new tab in bottom bar will show a dialog instead of automatically opening the link.
  • Handle crashes when opening links from Facebook
  • Crash fixes.
  • Synced translations
1.6.2
  • NEW:Open with menu item. Provides ability to open link in any browser when viewing.
  • NEW: 7.1+ "New tab" launcher shortcut.
  • IMPROVED: Rewritten blacklist feature.
  • IMPROVED: Better parsing of metadata from websites, thanks to Crux. Dynamic web toolbar color also enhanced.
  • IMPROVED: Height of bottom bar is reduced.
  • IMPROVED: Overhauled web head context screen.
  • IMPROVED: Share all has now has two different modes - multiple and csv. Can share to more apps now.
  • FIX: CCT not launching when setting certain apps like Instapaper as favorite share app.
1.6.1 View album
  • NEW: Minimize web heads - added a button in bottom bar/menu to minimize current open page back to web head. (Needs merge tabs to work)
  • NEW: General share as preferred action
  • IMPROVED: Web head context screen now syncs better with active web heads.
  • IMPROVED: Many performance and crash fixes.
  • IMPROVED: Translation updates.
  • FIX: Dynamic toolbar issues.
1.6

Web heads

  • NEW: Grouped web heads and much smoother animations.
  • NEW: Favicon support for web heads.
  • NEW: 5.0+ Aggressive background loading for web heads. Web heads will fully load pages instead of only pre-fetching.
  • NEW: Web head badge indicator to show no of active web heads.
  • NEW: Web head context menu (accessible by long press) to easily select any web site in group. Provides share all, individual share/close options.
  • NEW: Web heads if untouched, will hide further away from screen after 6 seconds.
  • NEW: Configure web head size (small, normal).
  • NEW: 5.0+ Web head now has realistic drop shadow.
  • NEW: 7.0+ Quick settings tile to toggle web head preference.
  • IMPROVED: 5.0+ Opened web sites will not be reloaded again, instead bought to front.
  • IMPROVED: Tweaked web head close and reveal animations.
  • IMPROVED: Overall performance.

Functional

  • NEW: Search view overhauled to support search suggestions.
  • NEW: 5.0+ Merge tabs and apps Option to open each web site in its own recents entry.
  • NEW: Bottom bar Provides extra options like ability to open link in new tab(5.0+) and quick share.
  • NEW: Multi language support.
  • IMPROVED: Custom tab launching speed.
  • IMPROVED: Custom tab share feature.
  • IMPROVED: Home screen shortcuts will now have title and icon extracted from the website.

Misc

  • NEW: Overhauled homepage now has simplified tabbed interface.
  • NEW: Animations > Tab switching, ripple feedback, color change and closing animation in web heads.
  • IMPROVED: Many bug fixes and performance improvements.


1.5.5.1
  • NEW: Configure animation speed, choose between medium and short.
  • NEW: Ability to turn off Lynket Scanning notification.
  • FIX: Open in Chrome not working if Merge Tabs and Apps in Chrome was on.
  • FIX: Blacklist FC.
1.5.5
  • FIX: Pre-fetching crash fixes for Samsung devices.
  • FIX: Crash when enabling dynamic toolbar for < 5.0 devices.
  • FIX: Blacklisting issues on Custom Tab enabled apps. Thanks to user - SpaceBison.
  • FIX: Springy animation when web heads attach to screen sides.
  • FIX: Open in Chrome menu taking to Chrome home screen.
  • IMPROVED: Faster custom tab opening animation.
1.5.4
  • NEW: Blacklisting: ability to launch your secondary browser instead of Lynket in certain apps.
  • NEW: \'X\' will be shown in search bar to quickly clear text while typing.
  • NEW: Launching url from main screen now respects web heads preference.
  • NEW: Much improved pre-fetch content. Optimized for memory and battery and shows a notification when links are pre-fetched.
  • NEW: OneSky translation link in about screen; do help translate Lynket to your language by contributing as a translator.
  • FIX: “Open in Lynket” issue. Separate Open in Chrome entry will be shown now.
  • IMPROVED: Tablet layout.
  • FIX: Janky scrolling in Lynket main screen.
  • FIX: Layout issues when font size is increased.
  • FIX: Secondary browser opening link twice.
  • FIX: Major optimizations and memory leak fixes.
1.5.3
  • FIX: Lynket not shown in recents on some devices.
  • FIX: Crashes and minor bugs.
1.5.2
  • NEW: Option to join beta program. Please join if you would like to contribute to Lynket\'s development.
  • IMPROVED: Minor improvements to web heads snapping to trash and webhead physics.
  • FIX: Lynket getting disappeared from recents view.
  • FIX: Open in Lynket is shown in Chrome beta and dev versions. Now a separate Open in Chrome will be shown.
  • FIX: Crashes and minor bugs.
1.5.1
  • NEW: Ability to choose color of web heads.
  • NEW: Ability to close all webheads from notification bar.
  • IMPROVED: Webheads dragging. Webheads now snap to trash when near.
  • IMPROVED: Scrolling behaviour in Lynket settings screen.
  • FIX: Not able to perform search on some keyboards. Now search icon will be shown on your keyboard, press that to launch URL or search.
  • FIX: Crash when trying to install Chrome from dialog.
  • FIX: Multiple crashes related to webheads.
  • FIX: Lynket settings appearing randomly when closing custom tabs.
  • FIX: For 6.0+, re ask permission to draw on other apps if it was revoked with webheads turned on.
1.5
  • NEW: WEBHEADS - Ability to stack multiple links in floating bubbles and open them later. See the separate Intro in main screen.
  • NEW: Configurable action item in custom tab. Choose between secondary browser and any sharing app. Example: Choose Pocket to instantly save the link.
  • NEW: Ability to do text and voice search from main screen with the new material design search bar.
  • NEW: Dynamic toolbar enhanced. Now can adapt color based on the launching app\'s color.
  • NEW: Launch screen, new icon and app intro.
  • IMPROVED: Better app pickers
  • IMPROVED: Sharing a non url text to Lynket will now do a Google search. Also in text selection pop up in 6.0
  • IMPROVED: Setting default behaviour on Cyanogen devices
  • IMPROVED: Improved warm up and pre-fetch performance on non Chrome browsers
  • IMPROVED: Reduced memory consumptions and general crash fixes
  • IMPROVED: UI layout changes
1.4.1
  • Rewritten affected code to avoid potential license violations.
1.4
  • NEW: Pre fetching. Lynket can scan links on screen and pre load them in background for you.
  • NEW: Option to keep browser warmed up. Improves launch times!
  • NEW: Dynamic toolbar color. Lynket can provide color based on the website, if the website has it.
  • NEW: Secondary browser option. Quickly get to your preferred app.
  • NEW: Add to home screen option.
  • IMPROVED: More material design
  • IMPROVED: Better setting default behaviour.
  • IMPROVED: Copy and share actions now target the current open page instead of first open page.
1.3
  • DONATE option. Please donate if you like this app and to support development:)
  • Share links to open in Lynket
  • For 6.0, select a text link to open in Lynket
  • Option to choose between multiple Chrome versions
  • About screen
  • Link to Lynket G+ community
  • Changelog screen
  • Link to Chrome in case no custom tab provider is found
1.2.1
  • Reworked share menu. Direct share enabled for 6.0
1.2
  • Change Toolbar color to your liking.
  • Configure animations.
  • Link to read about chrome custom tabs.
  • Option to share Lynket link to others.
  • Licenses dialog.
  • Tutorial flow performance fixes.
  • Icons and imagery updated.
1.1
  • Much requested copy and share options
1.0
  • Initial release.
